title: Login failure
body: I cannot log in to forums or my account through the client on my actual account. I need some help to get it fixed. I have a competetive math tonight that I need to be on my own account for. someone help please.

replies.body:
Is your client region connected to the correct account?  Is the error message while logging in resulting in invalid credentials or something else?

Our account team may be able to help recover the account, just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We may be a bit backed up though, but we'll respond back as soon as we can.  Hang tight!
